quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Whatever good things we build end up building us.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: You must take personal responsibility. You cannot change the circumstances, the seasons, or the wind, but you can change yourself. That is something you have charge of.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Character isn't something you were born with and can't change, like your fingerprints. It's something you weren't born with and must take responsibility for forming.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Take advantage of every opportunity to practice your communication skills so that when important occasions arise, you will have the gift, the style, the sharpness, the clarity, and the emotions to affect other people.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Effective communication is 20% what you know and 80% how you feel about what you know.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Formal education will make you a living self-education will make you a fortune.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: If someone is going down the wrong road, he doesn't need motivation to speed him up. What he needs is education to turn him around.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Take time to gather up the past so that you will be able to draw from your experience and invest them in the future.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Failure is not a single, cataclysmic event. You don't fail overnight. Instead, failure is a few errors in judgement, repeated every day.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Failure is simply a few errors in judgment, repeated every day.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Part of your heritage in this society is the opportunity to become financially independent.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Words do two major things: They provide food for the mind and create light for understanding and awareness.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Let others lead small lives, but not you. Let others argue over small things, but not you. Let others cry over small hurts, but not you. Let others leave their future in someone else's hands, but not you.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: A good objective of leadership is to help those who are doing poorly to do well and to help those who are doing well to do even better.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: If you go to work on your goals, your goals will go to work on you. If you go to work on your plan, your plan will go to work on you. Whatever good things we build end up building us.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Ideas can be life-changing. Sometimes all you need to open the door is just one more good idea.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Whoever renders service to many puts himself in line for greatness - great wealth, great return, great satisfaction, great reputation, and great joy.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Learning is the beginning of wealth. Learning is the beginning of health. Learning is the beginning of spirituality. Searching and learning is where the miracle process all begins.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Affirmation without discipline is the beginning of delusion.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Give whatever you are doing and whoever you are with the gift of your attention.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: The major value in life is not what you get. The major value in life is what you become.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Things that I felt absolutely sure of but a few years ago, I do not believe now. This thought makes me see more clearly how foolish it would be to expect all men to agree with me.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Time is more value than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Don't bring your need to the marketplace, bring your skill. If you don't feel well, tell your doctor, but not the marketplace. If you need money, go to the bank, but not the marketplace.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Money is usually attracted, not pursued.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Either you run the day or the day runs you.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Success is steady progress toward one's personal goals.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Success is neither magical nor mysterious. Success is the natural consequence of consistently applying the basic fundamentals.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Success is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Success is not to be pursued it is to be attracted by the person you become.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Make measurable progress in reasonable time.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: The reason that fiction is more interesting than any other form of literature, to those who really like to study people, is that in fiction the author can really tell the truth without humiliating himself.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.body: Work harder on yourself than you do on your job.
